trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Viser en kontroll primitiv som behandler plasseringen og størrelsen på en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> kontroll og to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> kontroller som brukes til å angi en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Spor-kontrollen har ikke en standardverdi <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>implementeres som en del av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: Sporet har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontroll og to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>Kontroller som brukes til å endre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>Spor-kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser et spor på en glidebryter.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **Et spor fra en glidebryter**![RepeatButton, er følgende](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, er følgende") tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene spor og tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>Egenskaper for de automatisk bindes til.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Når en av egenskapene endres, endres også bundet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Spor egenskapen | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>egenskapen | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene spor og tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Egenskaper som de binde når et spor er en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen og egenskapene spor ikke eksplisitt er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Spor egenskapen | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>egenskapen | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene spor og tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>Egenskaper som de binde når et spor er en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontrollen og egenskapene spor ikke eksplisitt er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: | Spor egenskapen | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>egenskapen | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| I tillegg av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontrollerer for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontrollen binde med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Egenskaper for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>Kontroller kontrollens spor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Når et spor brukes til å rulle innhold, størrelsen på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>kontrollen er proporsjonalt prosentandelen av innhold som vises i synlige området eller VISNINGSPORTEN.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser et eksempel på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll som implementerer en spor-kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **En rullefeltet som har en spor**![rullefeltet illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "rullefeltet illlustration") følgende beregning brukes til å beregne størrelsen på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) x trackLength viewportSize-parameteren er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Maksimum og minimum parametere samsvarer med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for uttrykket maksimalt – minste + viewportSize er størrelsen på rullbare innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>egenskapen representerer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>av sporet når innholdet er rullet til bunnen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>verdien er ikke det samme som lengden eller omfanget av innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis årsaken, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>av et spor i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>øker fra topp til bunn eller fra venstre mot høyre avhengig retningen på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>av et spor i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>øker fra bunnen toppen eller fra venstre mot høyre avhengig retningen på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å endre retningen på verdien økes, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>for sporet til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter oppsettet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Området som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> skal brukes for det <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> innhold.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som reduserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen er i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontrollerer av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>bindes til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som reduserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> kontrollerer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> trykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> kontroll med standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter underordnet av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du angir de underordnede elementene for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: De underordnede elementene indekseres i rekkefølgen som egenskapene er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for underordnet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer objekt av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen i listen over visual underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: Indeksen må være et tall mellom null (0) og verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>Obligatorisk (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: Den angitte indeksen er større enn verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>Obligatorisk (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som øker i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>-egenskapen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen er i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontrollerer av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>bindes til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som øker i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> kontrollerer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> trykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> kontroll med standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om retningen på øke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>er reversert fra Standardretning.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for IsDirectionReversed er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>exchange steder.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>verdier øker fra venstre mot høyre for både vannrett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>verdier for en loddrett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>øke fra topp til bunn, mens for en loddrett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>disse verdier øker fra bunnen toppen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Når du setter IsDirectionReversed-egenskapen til `true`, sorteringsretningen øke verdien reverserer.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementerer en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontrollen, og du ikke eksplisitt angi egenskapen IsDirectionReversed, egenskapen IsDirectionReversed binder seg til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <> </> *> og <> </> *> byttet posisjonen og sorteringsretningen øke verdien er omvendt; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimum <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen er i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>kontrollen og egenskapen maksimalt ikke er eksplisitt angitt, egenskapen binding automatisk med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Maksimumsverdien for et <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen tilsvarer størrelsen på innholdet rullbare minus størrelsen på synlige innhold området eller VISNINGSPORTEN.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis størrelsen på innholdet 100 og størrelsen på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>er 30, verdien for egenskapen maksimalt er 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen tilsvarer posisjonen i rullbare innhold som vises øverst i VISNINGSPORTEN.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Når innholdet er rullet helt nederst i dette eksemplet, vises fremdeles 30 prosent av innholdet i VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>som svarer til toppen av VISNINGSPORTEN er 70, og maksimumsverdien 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>tilsvarer en plassering i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ![Verdien som tilsvarer plasseringen av innholdet](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "verdien tilsvarer plasseringen av innholdet") ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.target: Den største tillatte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> vises vannrett eller loddrett.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementerer en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen, og du ikke har angitt retning-egenskapen, retningen egenskapen binding til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementerer en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontrollen, og du ikke har angitt retning-egenskapen, retningen egenskapen binding til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> kontrollen som brukes til å endre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that is used with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> kontroll som brukes med den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> kontroll med standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> as determined by the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjeldende verdi for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> i henhold til posisjonen for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The Value represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som representerer en verdi mellom den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Value property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen er en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>kontroll og verdien for egenskapen ikke er angitt eksplisitt egenskapen automatisk binding med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende verdi for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> moves.
trans-unit.target: Beregner endringen i den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> når den <> </> *> flytter.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: Den vannrette forskyvningen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: Den loddrette forskyvningen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The change in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> that corresponds to the displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Endringen i <> </> *> som samsvarer med forskyvning av den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> to a specified point along the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Beregner avstanden fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> til et angitt punkt langs den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte punktet.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the and the specified pt value.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden mellom den og det angitte pt verdi.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på delen av rullbare innholdet som er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the ViewportSize is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen ViewportSize brukes til å beregne størrelsen på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>kontrollere i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>når ViewportSize er ikke <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se kommentarer for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definere størrelsen på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>oppretter du et objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>klassen og gi overstyringer og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementerer en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen, og du ikke eksplisitt angi egenskapen ViewportSize, egenskapen ViewportSize binder seg til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen ViewportSize for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen som er implementert i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontrollen er alltid <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>kontrollen ikke endre størrelse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på synlige for rullbare innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, noe som betyr at størrelsen på innholdet ikke er definert.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall underordnede elementer i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du angir de underordnede elementene for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: De underordnede elementene indekseres i rekkefølgen som egenskapene er angitt.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall mellom 0 og 2 som angir antall underordnede elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.
